#summary List of libraries here and quick links to them

Below is a list of the libraries being worked on in this project, with links to their final released versions and their in-development version. 



== !KeyDragZoom ==

This class allows user drag a hot key(e.g. shift) while drag a box on the map to zoom in.

Browse [http://google-maps-utility-library-v3.googlecode.com/svn/tags/keydragzoom/ Released Versions] or
[http://google-maps-utility-library-v3.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/keydragzoom/ Development Version].
